Text:
Is this NSTC or PAL? Are you going to put up the rest of the season? 
Thank you.

It is NTSC. I will post a full season so for forming SEEDs.
Thanks

Thank your for your reply. I will of course seed for as long as possible after the 1:1 Sometimes I can let something seed for 2-3 copies depending on the space on my hard drive. 

Again: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
